Package com.example.potato1_events

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.potato1_events.User
public class User extends Object
Represents a user within the Potato1 Events application. This class includes all necessary information for entrants, organizers, and administrators.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Default constructor required for Firestore serialization. Initializes isAdmin to false by default.

    • User

      public User(String userId, String role, String name, String email, String phoneNumber, String imagePath, boolean notificationsEnabled, long createdAt)
      Parameterized constructor to create a User object.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique identifier (UID) from Firebase Authentication.
      role - The role of the user (Entrant, Organizer, Admin).
      name - The user's full name.
      email - The user's email address.
      phoneNumber - The user's phone number.
      imagePath - The Firebase Storage path to the user's profile picture.
      notificationsEnabled - Whether the user has opted in for notifications.
      createdAt - Timestamp of when the user was created.

      public boolean isNotificationsEnabled()
      Checks if the user has enabled notifications.
      Returns:
      True if notifications are enabled, false otherwise.

    • setNotificationsEnabled

      public void setNotificationsEnabled(boolean notificationsEnabled)
      Sets the user's notification preference.
      Parameters:
      notificationsEnabled - True to enable notifications, false to disable.

    • isAdmin

      public boolean isAdmin()
      Checks if the user has administrative privileges. This field is intended to be managed directly in the database.
      Returns:
      True if the user is an admin, false otherwise.

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Gets the entrant's status related to event participation.
      Returns:
      The entrant's status (e.g., Waiting List, Accepted, Rejected).

      Sets the entrant's status related to event participation.
